title: Kanye West has a 'no makeup rule' for daughter North West
text:
Kanye West's daughter North's makeup play dates may be coming to an end... for now.

In an interview with E! News, Kim Kardashian West revealed that Kanye has a rule against North West, 6, wearing makeup after Kardashian West allowed her to, to West's dismay.

"I'd let her wear, you know, she has a little red for Christmas, I'd let her wear a red lip, or I'd let her do one pop of something," Kardashian West said. "I'd let her, if she's wearing a black dress, a black lip."

"I kind of got in trouble for that," Kardashian West shared. "So, it's now no more makeup."

North has been spotted wearing makeup a few times in the past before.

In April, Kardashian West posted a photo of North on Instagram with two high pigtails, braids and bright eyeliner while getting prepped to pose on the cover of a special edition of WWD Beauty Inc.

While North already seems to have a love for beauty and fashion like her mother, it looks like she will have to leave the makeup alone for now.
description: Kim Kardashian reveals in an interview that Kanye West has a rule against their daughter North West wearing makeup.
